data.title: Turning Paradiso into a steaming sauna
data.meta_description: Who would have guessed? Eagles Of Death Metal are more than just a gimmick. Or are they? Well, I'd still call that a controversial statement. But if a band sells out one of the hottest clubs in Holland without actually having a chart hit or in fact any really remarkable
